oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio I : Programme de recherche en agriculture biologiue
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Agribio I program is a major program for organic farming research in the 2000-2003 period. Several organic farming projects are funded under this program, most of which are being carried out by INRA or by INRA-ACTA collaboration. Most of the projects concerns Crop husbandry, but also some projects in the areas of farming system, animal husbandry, environmental aspects, food systems and value, standards and certification.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Programme} Agribio I : Programme de recherche en agriculture biologiue. [Agribio I : Research program in organic farming.] Runs 2000 - 2003.
